00205 BOOLEAN InitiateConversation( SOLDIERTYPE *pDestSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pSrcSoldier, INT8 bApproach, UINT32 uiApproachData )
00206 {
00207       // ATE: OK, let's check the status of the Q
00208       // If it has something in it....delay this until after....
00209       if ( DialogueQueueIsEmptyOrSomebodyTalkingNow( ) )
00210       {
00211             gfConversationPending = FALSE;
00212 
00213             // Initiate directly....
00214             return( InternalInitiateConversation( pDestSoldier, pSrcSoldier, bApproach, uiApproachData ) );
00215       }
00216       else
00217       {
00218             // Wait.....
00219             gfConversationPending = TRUE;
00220             
00221             gpPendingDestSoldier    = pDestSoldier;
00222             gpPendingSrcSoldier           = pSrcSoldier;
00223             gbPendingApproach             = bApproach;
00224             guiPendingApproachData= uiApproachData;
00225 
00226             //Engaged on conv...
00227             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ENGAGED_IN_CONV;
00228 
00229             // Turn off lock UI ( if on )
00230             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00231             HandleTacticalUI( );
00232 
00233             // Turn on talking ui
00234             guiPendingOverrideEvent = TA_TALKINGMENU;
00235             HandleTacticalUI( );
00236 
00237             return( FALSE );
00238       }
00239 }
00240 
00241 void HandlePendingInitConv( )
00242 {
00243       if ( gfConversationPending )
00244       {
00245             // OK, if pending, remove and now call........
00246             InternalInitiateConversation( gpPendingDestSoldier, gpPendingSrcSoldier, gbPendingApproach, guiPendingApproachData );
00247       }
00248 }

00250 
00251 BOOLEAN InternalInitiateConversation( SOLDIERTYPE *pDestSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pSrcSoldier, INT8 bApproach, UINT32 uiApproachData )
00252 {
00253       // OK, init talking menu
00254       BOOLEAN     fFromPending;
00255 
00256       fFromPending = gfConversationPending;
00257 
00258       // Set pending false
00259       gfConversationPending = FALSE;
00260 
00261       // ATE: If we are already in menu, delete!
00262       if ( gfInTalkPanel )
00263       {
00264             DeleteTalkingMenu( );
00265       }
00266 
00267       if ( !InitTalkingMenu( pDestSoldier->ubProfile, pDestSoldier->sGridNo ) )
00268       {
00269             // If failed, and we were pending, unlock UI
00270             if ( fFromPending )
00271             {
00272                   gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~ENGAGED_IN_CONV);
00273             }
00274 
00275 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00276             ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"Cannot initiate conversation menu.. check for face file for ID: %d.", pDestSoldier->ubProfile );
00277 #endif
00278             return( FALSE );
00279       }
00280 
00281       // Set soldier pointer
00282       gpSrcSoldier = pSrcSoldier;
00283       gpDestSoldier = pDestSoldier;
00284 
00285       // Say first line...
00286       // CHRIS LOOK HERE
00287       if ( gpSrcSoldier != NULL )
00288       {
00289             gubSrcSoldierProfile = gpSrcSoldier->ubProfile;
00290       }
00291       else
00292       {
00293             gubSrcSoldierProfile = NO_PROFILE;
00294       }
00295 
00296       // find which squad this guy is, then set selected squad to this guy
00297       if ( pSrcSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum )
00298       {
00299             SetCurrentSquad( gpSrcSoldier->bAssignment, FALSE );
00300 
00301     SelectSoldier( pSrcSoldier->ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
00302       }
00303 
00304       Converse( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum, gubSrcSoldierProfile, bApproach, uiApproachData );
00305 
00306       // If not from pedning...
00307       if ( !fFromPending )
00308       {
00309             //Engaged on conv...
00310             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ENGAGED_IN_CONV;
00311 
00312             // Turn off lock UI ( if on )
00313             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
00314             HandleTacticalUI( );
00315 
00316             // Turn on talking ui
00317             guiPendingOverrideEvent = TA_TALKINGMENU;
00318             HandleTacticalUI( );
00319       }
00320       else
00321       {
00322             guiPendingOverrideEvent = TA_TALKINGMENU;
00323             HandleTacticalUI( );
00324       }
00325 
00326       return( TRUE );
00327 }

00330 BOOLEAN InitTalkingMenu( UINT8 ubCharacterNum, INT16 sGridNo )
00331 {
00332       INT16                                     sXMapPos, sYMapPos, sScreenX, sScreenY;
00333       INT16                                     sX, sY;
00334 
00335       // Get XY values
00336       {
00337             // Get XY locations for gridno.
00338             ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXMapPos, &sYMapPos );
00339 
00340             // Get screen XY pos from map XY
00341             // Be carefull to convert to cell cords
00342             CellXYToScreenXY( (INT16)((sXMapPos*CELL_X_SIZE)), (INT16)((sYMapPos*CELL_Y_SIZE)), &sScreenX, &sScreenY);
00343 
00344 
00345             // First get mouse xy screen location
00346             sX = sScreenX;
00347             sY = sScreenY;
00348 
00349             return( InternalInitTalkingMenu( ubCharacterNum, sX, sY ) );
00350       }
00351 }
00352 
00353 BOOLEAN InternalInitTalkingMenu( UINT8 ubCharacterNum, INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00354 {
00355       INT32 iFaceIndex, cnt;
00356       VSURFACE_DESC                 vs_desc;
00357       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
00358       UINT16                                    usWidth;
00359       UINT16                                    usHeight;
00360   VOBJECT_DESC                VObjectDesc;
00361       INT16                                     sCenterYVal, sCenterXVal;
00362       UINT8                                     ubString[48];
00363 
00364 
00365       // disable scroll messages
00366       HideMessagesDuringNPCDialogue( );
00367 
00368       //ATE: OK, let go of any other dialogues up.....
00369       EraseInterfaceMenus( FALSE );
00370 
00371 
00372       gTalkPanel.ubCharNum          =           ubCharacterNum;
00373       gTalkPanel.bCurSelect   = -1;
00374       gTalkPanel.bOldCurSelect = -1;
00375       gTalkPanel.fHandled           =           FALSE;
00376       gTalkPanel.fOnName            =           FALSE;
00377 
00378       // Load Video Object!
00379       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00380       sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, "INTERFACE\\talkbox1.sti" );
00381       // Load
00382       if( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &( gTalkPanel.uiPanelVO ) ) == FALSE )
00383       {
00384             return( 0 );
00385       }
00386 
00387       // Get ETRLE Properties
00388       GetVideoObjectETRLESubregionProperties( gTalkPanel.uiPanelVO, 0, &usWidth, &usHeight );   
00389 
00390       // Set values into structure
00391       gTalkPanel.usWidth  = usWidth;
00392       gTalkPanel.usHeight     = usHeight;
00393 
00394       // Check coords
00395       {
00396 
00397             // CHECK FOR LEFT/RIGHT
00398             sCenterXVal = gTalkPanel.usWidth / 2;
00399 
00400             sX -= sCenterXVal;
00401 
00402             // Check right
00403             if ( ( sX + gTalkPanel.usWidth ) > SCREEN_WIDTH )
00404             {
00405                   sX = SCREEN_WIDTH - gTalkPanel.usWidth;
00406             }
00407 
00408             // Check left
00409             if ( sX < 0 )
00410             {
00411                   sX = 0;
00412             }
00413 
00414             // Now check for top
00415             // Center in the y
00416             sCenterYVal = gTalkPanel.usHeight / 2;
00417 
00418             sY -= sCenterYVal;
00419 
00420             if ( sY < gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y )
00421             {
00422                   sY = gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y;
00423             }
00424 
00425             // Check for bottom
00426             if ( ( sY + gTalkPanel.usHeight ) > INV_INTERFACE_START_Y )
00427             {
00428                   sY = INV_INTERFACE_START_Y - gTalkPanel.usHeight;
00429             }
00430 
00431       }
00432 
00433       //Set values
00434       gTalkPanel.sX                             =           sX;   
00435       gTalkPanel.sY                             =           sY;   
00436 
00437       CalculatePopupTextOrientation( TALK_PANEL_CALC_SUBTITLE_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_CALC_SUBTITLE_HEIGHT );
00438 
00439       // Create face ( a big face! )....
00440       iFaceIndex = InitFace( ubCharacterNum, NOBODY, FACE_BIGFACE | FACE_POTENTIAL_KEYWAIT );
00441 
00442       CHECKF( iFaceIndex != -1 );
00443 
00444       // Set face
00445       gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex   = iFaceIndex;
00446 
00447       // Init face to auto..., create video overlay....
00448       pFace = &gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ];
00449 
00450 
00451       // Create mouse regions...
00452       sX = gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_REGION_STARTX;
00453       sY = gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_REGION_STARTY;
00454 
00455 
00456       //Define main region
00457       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gTalkPanel.ScreenRegion), 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT , MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00458                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
00459       // Add region
00460       MSYS_AddRegion(&(gTalkPanel.ScreenRegion) );
00461 
00462 
00463       //Define main region
00464       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gTalkPanel.BackRegion), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + gTalkPanel.usWidth ),(INT16)( gTalkPanel.sY + gTalkPanel.usHeight ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00465                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, TalkPanelBaseRegionClickCallback ); 
00466       // Add region
00467       MSYS_AddRegion(&(gTalkPanel.BackRegion) );
00468 
00469 
00470       //Define name region
00471       MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gTalkPanel.NameRegion), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_NAME_X ), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_NAME_Y), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_NAME_WIDTH + TALK_PANEL_NAME_X ),(INT16)( gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_NAME_HEIGHT + TALK_PANEL_NAME_Y ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00472                                      CURSOR_NORMAL, TalkPanelNameRegionMoveCallback, TalkPanelNameRegionClickCallback ); 
00473       // Add region
00474       MSYS_AddRegion(&(gTalkPanel.NameRegion) );
00475 
00476 
00477       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
00478       {
00479             // Build a mouse region here that is over any others.....
00480             MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gTalkPanel.Regions[cnt]), (INT16)(sX), (INT16)(sY), (INT16)(sX + TALK_PANEL_REGION_WIDTH ),(INT16)( sY + TALK_PANEL_REGION_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00481                                            CURSOR_NORMAL, TalkPanelMoveCallback, TalkPanelClickCallback ); 
00482             // Add region
00483             MSYS_AddRegion( &(gTalkPanel.Regions[cnt]));
00484             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &(gTalkPanel.Regions[cnt]), 0, cnt );
00485 
00486             sY += TALK_PANEL_REGION_SPACEY;
00487       }
00488 
00489       // Build save buffer
00490       // Create a buffer for him to go!
00491       // OK, ignore screen widths, height, only use BPP 
00492       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00493       vs_desc.usWidth = pFace->usFaceWidth;
00494       vs_desc.usHeight = pFace->usFaceHeight;
00495       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00496       CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &(gTalkPanel.uiSaveBuffer ) ) );
00497 
00498       // Set face to auto
00499       SetAutoFaceActive( gTalkPanel.uiSaveBuffer, FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER, iFaceIndex , 0, 0 );
00500   gFacesData[ iFaceIndex ].uiFlags |= FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE;
00501 
00502       // Load buttons, create button
00503       sprintf( (char *)ubString, "INTERFACE\\talkbox2.sti" );
00504       gTalkPanel.iButtonImages                  = LoadButtonImage( ubString, -1,3,-1,4,-1 );
00505 
00506 
00507       gTalkPanel.uiCancelButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( gTalkPanel.iButtonImages, zDialogActions[ DIALOG_DONE ], MILITARYFONT1, 
00508                                                                                      33, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00509                                                                                      33, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00510                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00511                                                                                      (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_BUTTON_X), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_BUTTON_Y), BUTTON_TOGGLE ,MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00512                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)DoneTalkingButtonClickCallback );
00513 
00514       SpecifyButtonHilitedTextColors( gTalkPanel.uiCancelButton, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00515 
00516       // Turn off dirty flags
00517       ButtonList[ gTalkPanel.uiCancelButton ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_DIRTY);
00518 
00519       // Render once!
00520       RenderAutoFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex );
00521 
00522       gfInTalkPanel = TRUE;
00523 
00524       gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
00525 
00526       
00527 
00528       // return OK....
00529       return( TRUE );
00530 }

00532 
00533 void DoneTalkingButtonClickCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00534 {
00535       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00536       {
00537             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00538       }
00539       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP  )
00540       {
00541             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00542 
00543             // OK, pickup item....
00544             gTalkPanel.fHandled = TRUE;
00545             gTalkPanel.fHandledTalkingVal = gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ].fTalking;
00546             gTalkPanel.fHandledCanDeleteVal = TRUE;
00547       }
00548 }

00550 
00551 void DeleteTalkingMenu( )
00552 {
00553       INT32 cnt;
00554 
00555       if ( !gfInTalkPanel )
00556             return;
00557 
00558       // Delete sound if playing....
00559       ShutupaYoFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex );
00560 
00561       // Delete screen region
00562       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gTalkPanel.ScreenRegion));
00563 
00564       // Delete main region
00565       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gTalkPanel.BackRegion));
00566 
00567       // Delete name region
00568       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gTalkPanel.NameRegion));
00569 
00570       // Delete mouse regions
00571       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
00572       {
00573             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gTalkPanel.Regions[cnt]));
00574       }
00575 
00576       if ( gTalkPanel.fTextRegionOn )
00577       {
00578             // Remove
00579             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gTalkPanel.TextRegion) );
00580             gTalkPanel.fTextRegionOn = FALSE;
00581       }
00582 
00583       // Delete save buffer
00584       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( gTalkPanel.uiSaveBuffer );
00585 
00586       // Remove video object
00587       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( gTalkPanel.uiPanelVO );
00588 
00589       // Remove face....
00590       DeleteFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex );
00591 
00592       // Remove button
00593       RemoveButton( gTalkPanel.uiCancelButton );
00594 
00595       // Remove button images
00596       UnloadButtonImage( gTalkPanel.iButtonImages );
00597 
00598       // Set cursor back to normal mode...
00599       guiPendingOverrideEvent = A_CHANGE_TO_MOVE;     
00600 
00601       // Rerender world
00602       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00603 
00604       gfInTalkPanel = FALSE;
00605 
00606       gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
00607 
00608       // Set this guy up as NOT engaged in conversation
00609       gpDestSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_ENGAGEDINACTION);
00610 
00611       //NOT Engaged on conv...
00612       if ( !giNPCReferenceCount )
00613       {
00614             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~ENGAGED_IN_CONV);
00615       }
00616 
00617       // restore scroll messages in tactical
00618       UnHideMessagesDuringNPCDialogue( );
00619 
00620       if ( CheckFact( FACT_NEED_TO_SAY_SOMETHING, 0 ) )
00621       {
00622             if ( DialogueQueueIsEmpty() && !gfWaitingForTriggerTimer )
00623             {
00624                   UINT8 ubNPC;
00625                   BOOLEAN fNice = FALSE;
00626                   SOLDIERTYPE * pNPC;
00627 
00628                   if ( gubNiceNPCProfile != NO_PROFILE )
00629                   {
00630                         ubNPC = gubNiceNPCProfile;
00631                         fNice = TRUE;
00632                   }
00633                   else
00634                   {
00635                         ubNPC = gubNastyNPCProfile;
00636                   }
00637 
00638                   if ( ubNPC != NO_PROFILE )
00639                   {
00640                         pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
00641                         if (pNPC)
00642                         {
00643                               // find someone to say their "nice guy" line
00644                               if ( fNice )
00645                               {
00646                                     SayQuote58FromNearbyMercInSector( pNPC->sGridNo, 10, QUOTE_LISTEN_LIKABLE_PERSON, gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].bSex );
00647                               }
00648                               else
00649                               {
00650                                     SayQuoteFromNearbyMercInSector( pNPC->sGridNo, 10, QUOTE_ANNOYING_PC );
00651                               }
00652                               gubNiceNPCProfile = NO_PROFILE;
00653                               gubNastyNPCProfile = NO_PROFILE;
00654                               SetFactFalse( FACT_NEED_TO_SAY_SOMETHING );
00655                         }
00656                   }
00657             }
00658       }
00659 
00660   if ( iInterfaceDialogueBox != -1 )
00661   {
00662     RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iInterfaceDialogueBox );
00663     iInterfaceDialogueBox = -1;
00664   }
00665 
00666       // Save time for give item
00667       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeCounterForGiveItemSrc = GetJA2Clock( );
00668 }
00669 
00670 void RenderTalkingMenu( )
00671 {
00672       INT32 cnt;
00673       FACETYPE                *pFace;
00674       INT16                         sFontX, sFontY, sX, sY;
00675       UINT8                         ubCharacterNum = gTalkPanel.ubCharNum;
00676       UINT32                        uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00677       UINT8                         *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00678       UINT16                        usTextBoxWidth, usTextBoxHeight;
00679       CHAR16                        zTempString[128];
00680 
00681 
00682       if ( !gfInTalkPanel )
00683       {
00684             return;
00685       }
00686 
00687       pFace = &gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ];
00688 
00689       if ( gTalkPanel.fDirtyLevel == DIRTYLEVEL2 )
00690       {
00691             SetFont( MILITARYFONT1 );
00692 
00693             // Render box!
00694             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, gTalkPanel.uiPanelVO, 0, gTalkPanel.sX, gTalkPanel.sY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00695 
00696             // Render name
00697             if ( gTalkPanel.fOnName )
00698             {
00699                   SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00700                   SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00701             }
00702             else
00703             {
00704                   SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00705                   SetFontForeground( 33 );
00706             }
00707             VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_NAME_X), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_NAME_Y), TALK_PANEL_NAME_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_NAME_HEIGHT, MILITARYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s", gMercProfiles[ gTalkPanel.ubCharNum ].zNickname );
00708             mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", gMercProfiles[ ubCharacterNum ].zNickname );
00709 
00710             // Set font settings back
00711             SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00712 
00713             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00714             pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface( gTalkPanel.uiSaveBuffer, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00715 
00716             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00717                         (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00718                         (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_FACE_X), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_FACE_Y), 
00719                         0 , 0, 
00720                         pFace->usFaceWidth, pFace->usFaceHeight );
00721 
00722             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00723             UnLockVideoSurface( gTalkPanel.uiSaveBuffer );
00724 
00725             MarkButtonsDirty( );
00726 
00727             // If guy is talking.... shadow area
00728             if ( pFace->fTalking || !DialogueQueueIsEmpty( ) )
00729             {
00730                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_SHADOW_AREA_X),(INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_SHADOW_AREA_Y), (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_SHADOW_AREA_X + TALK_PANEL_SHADOW_AREA_WIDTH) , (INT16)(gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_SHADOW_AREA_Y + TALK_PANEL_SHADOW_AREA_HEIGHT) );            
00731 
00732                   // Disable mouse regions....
00733                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
00734                   {
00735                         MSYS_DisableRegion( &(gTalkPanel.Regions[cnt]));
00736                   }
00737 
00738                   DisableButton( gTalkPanel.uiCancelButton );
00739 
00740                   gTalkPanel.bCurSelect = -1;
00741             }
00742             else
00743             {
00744                   // Enable mouse regions....
00745                   for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
00746                   {
00747                         MSYS_EnableRegion( &(gTalkPanel.Regions[cnt]));
00748                   }
00749 
00750                   // Restore selection....
00751                   gTalkPanel.bCurSelect = gTalkPanel.bOldCurSelect;
00752 
00753                   EnableButton( gTalkPanel.uiCancelButton );
00754             }
00755 
00756             InvalidateRegion( gTalkPanel.sX, gTalkPanel.sY, gTalkPanel.sX + gTalkPanel.usWidth, gTalkPanel.sY + gTalkPanel.usHeight );
00757 
00758             if ( gTalkPanel.fSetupSubTitles )
00759             {
00760       if ( iInterfaceDialogueBox != -1 )
00761       {
00762         // Remove any old ones....
00763         RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iInterfaceDialogueBox );
00764         iInterfaceDialogueBox = -1;
00765       }
00766 
00767       SET_USE_WINFONTS( TRUE );
00768       SET_WINFONT( giSubTitleWinFont ); 
00769                   iInterfaceDialogueBox = PrepareMercPopupBox( iInterfaceDialogueBox,BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, (STR16) gTalkPanel.zQuoteStr, TALK_PANEL_DEFAULT_SUBTITLE_WIDTH, 0, 0, 0, &usTextBoxWidth, &usTextBoxHeight );
00770       SET_USE_WINFONTS( FALSE );
00771 
00772                   gTalkPanel.fSetupSubTitles = FALSE;
00773 
00774                   CalculatePopupTextOrientation( usTextBoxWidth, usTextBoxHeight );
00775                   CalculatePopupTextPosition( usTextBoxWidth, usTextBoxHeight );
00776 
00777                   //Define main region
00778                   if ( gTalkPanel.fTextRegionOn )
00779                   {
00780                         // Remove
00781                         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &(gTalkPanel.TextRegion) );
00782                         gTalkPanel.fTextRegionOn = FALSE;
00783                   }
00784 
00785                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &(gTalkPanel.TextRegion), gTalkPanel.sPopupX, gTalkPanel.sPopupY, (INT16)( gTalkPanel.sPopupX + usTextBoxWidth ), (INT16)( gTalkPanel.sPopupY + usTextBoxHeight ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
00786                                                  CURSOR_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, TextRegionClickCallback ); 
00787                   // Add region
00788                   MSYS_AddRegion(&(gTalkPanel.TextRegion) );
00789 
00790                   // Set to true
00791                   gTalkPanel.fTextRegionOn = TRUE;
00792             }
00793 
00794             if ( gTalkPanel.fRenderSubTitlesNow )
00795             {
00796                   RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iInterfaceDialogueBox, gTalkPanel.sPopupX, gTalkPanel.sPopupY,  FRAME_BUFFER );
00797             }
00798       }
00799 
00800       if ( gTalkPanel.fDirtyLevel > DIRTYLEVEL0 )
00801       {
00802             SetFont( MILITARYFONT1 );
00803 
00804             // Set some font settings
00805             SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
00806             SetFontShadow( MILITARY_SHADOW );
00807 
00808             // Create menu selections....
00809             sX = gTalkPanel.sX + TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_STARTX;
00810             sY = gTalkPanel.sY + TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_STARTY;
00811 
00812             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < 6; cnt++ )
00813             {
00814 
00815                   if ( gTalkPanel.bCurSelect == cnt ) 
00816                   {
00817                         SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00818                         SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00819                   }
00820                   else
00821                   {
00822                         SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
00823                         SetFontShadow( MILITARY_SHADOW );
00824                   }
00825 
00826                   {
00827 
00828                   #ifdef _DEBUG
00829                         if (gubSrcSoldierProfile != NO_PROFILE && ubCharacterNum != NO_PROFILE)
00830                   #else
00831                         if ( CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL() && gubSrcSoldierProfile != NO_PROFILE && ubCharacterNum != NO_PROFILE)
00832                   #endif
00833                         {
00834                               switch( cnt )
00835                               {
00836                                     case 0:
00837                                           VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_HEIGHT, MILITARYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s", zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ] );
00838                                           mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ] );
00839                                           break;
00840                                     case 4:
00841                                           //if its an arms dealer
00842                                           if( IsMercADealer( ubCharacterNum ) )
00843                                           {
00844                                                 UINT8 ubType;
00845 
00846                                                 //determine the 'kind' of arms dealer
00847                                                 ubType = GetTypeOfArmsDealer( GetArmsDealerIDFromMercID( ubCharacterNum ) );
00848 
00849                                                 wcscpy( zTempString, zDealerStrings[ ubType ] );
00850                                           }
00851                                           else
00852                                                 wcscpy( zTempString, zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ] );
00853 
00854                                           VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_HEIGHT, MILITARYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s", zTempString );
00855                                           mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", zTempString );
00856                                           break;
00857                                     default:
00858                                           VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_HEIGHT, MILITARYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s (%d)", zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ], ubTalkMenuApproachIDs[ cnt ] );
00859                                           mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s (%d)", zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ], CalcDesireToTalk( ubCharacterNum, gubSrcSoldierProfile, ubTalkMenuApproachIDs[ cnt ] )  );
00860                                           break;
00861                               }
00862                         }
00863                         else
00864                         {
00865                               if( cnt == 4 )
00866                               {
00867                                     //if its an arms dealer
00868                                     if( IsMercADealer( ubCharacterNum ) )
00869                                     {
00870                                           UINT8 ubType;
00871 
00872                                           //determine the 'kind' of arms dealer
00873                                           ubType = GetTypeOfArmsDealer( GetArmsDealerIDFromMercID( ubCharacterNum ) );
00874 
00875                                           wcscpy( zTempString, zDealerStrings[ ubType ] );
00876                                     }
00877                                     else
00878                                           wcscpy( zTempString, zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ] );
00879 
00880                                     VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_HEIGHT, MILITARYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s", zTempString );
00881                                     mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", zTempString );
00882                               }
00883                               else
00884                               {
00885                                     VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( sX, sY, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_WIDTH, TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_HEIGHT, MILITARYFONT1, &sFontX, &sFontY, L"%s", zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ] );
00886                                     mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", zTalkMenuStrings[ cnt ] );
00887                               }
00888                         }
00889                   }
00890 
00891                   sY += TALK_PANEL_MENUTEXT_SPACEY;
00892             }
00893 
00894       }
00895 
00896       // Set font settings back
00897       SetFontShadow( DEFAULT_SHADOW );
00898 
00899       gTalkPanel.fDirtyLevel = 0;
00900 }

00903 
00904 void TalkPanelMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00905 {
00906       UINT32                              uiItemPos;
00907 
00908       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00909 
00910       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
00911       {
00912             // Set current selected guy....
00913             gTalkPanel.bCurSelect =(INT8)uiItemPos;
00914             gTalkPanel.bOldCurSelect = gTalkPanel.bCurSelect;
00915       }
00916       else if ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00917       {
00918             gTalkPanel.bCurSelect = -1;
00919             gTalkPanel.bOldCurSelect = -1;
00920       }
00921 
00922 }
00923 
00924 void TalkPanelClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00925 {
00926       UINT32                              uiItemPos;
00927       BOOLEAN                             fDoConverse = TRUE;
00928       uiItemPos = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00929 
00930 
00931       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00932       {
00933             // Donot do this if we are talking already
00934             if ( !gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ].fTalking )
00935             {
00936                   if ( ubTalkMenuApproachIDs[ uiItemPos ] == APPROACH_BUYSELL )
00937                   {
00938                         //if its an arms dealer
00939                         if( IsMercADealer( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum ) )
00940                         {
00941                               if ( NPCHasUnusedRecordWithGivenApproach( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum, APPROACH_BUYSELL ) )
00942                               {
00943                                     TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum, APPROACH_BUYSELL, TRUE );
00944                               }
00945                               else
00946                               {
00947                                     DeleteTalkingMenu( );
00948 
00949                                     //Enter the shopkeeper interface
00950                                     EnterShopKeeperInterfaceScreen( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum );
00951                               }
00952 
00953                               /*
00954                               // check if this is a shopkeeper who has been shutdown
00955                               if( HandleShopKeepHasBeenShutDown( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum ) == FALSE )
00956                               {
00957                                     DeleteTalkingMenu( );
00958 
00959                                     EnterShopKeeperInterfaceScreen( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum );
00960                               }
00961                               */
00962                         }
00963                         else
00964                         {
00965                               // Do something different if we selected the 'give' approach
00966                               // Close panel, set UI guy to wait a sec, open inv if not done so yet
00967                               gTalkPanel.fHandled = TRUE;
00968                               gTalkPanel.fHandledTalkingVal = gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ].fTalking;
00969                               gTalkPanel.fHandledCanDeleteVal = TRUE;
00970 
00971                               // open inv panel...
00972                               gfSwitchPanel = TRUE;
00973                               gbNewPanel = SM_PANEL;
00974                               gubNewPanelParam = (UINT8)gpSrcSoldier->ubID;
00975 
00976                               // Wait!
00977                               gpDestSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WAIT;
00978                               gpDestSoldier->usNextActionData = 10000;
00979 
00980                               // UNless he's has a pending action, delete what he was doing!
00981                               // Cancel anything he was doing
00982                               if ( gpDestSoldier->bAction != AI_ACTION_PENDING_ACTION )
00983                               {
00984                                     CancelAIAction( gpDestSoldier, TRUE );
00985                               }
00986                         }
00987                   }
00988                   else
00989                   {
00990                         if ( fDoConverse )
00991                         {
00992                               //Speak
00993                               Converse( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum, gubSrcSoldierProfile, (INT8)ubTalkMenuApproachIDs[ uiItemPos ], 0 );
00994                         }
00995                   }
00996             }
00997       }
00998       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00999       {
01000 
01001       }
01002 }
01003 
01004 void TalkPanelBaseRegionClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01005 {
01006             static BOOLEAN fLButtonDown = FALSE;
01007 
01008       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01009       {
01010             fLButtonDown = TRUE;
01011       }
01012 
01013       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP && fLButtonDown )
01014       {
01015             // Only do this if we are talking already
01016             if ( gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ].fTalking )
01017             {
01018                   // Stop speech, cancel
01019                   InternalShutupaYoFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex, FALSE );
01020 
01021                   fLButtonDown = FALSE;
01022             }
01023       }
01024       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01025       {
01026             fLButtonDown = FALSE;
01027       }
01028 }
01029 
01030 void TalkPanelNameRegionClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01031 {
01032 
01033       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01034       {
01035             // Donot do this if we are talking already
01036             if ( !gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ].fTalking )
01037             {
01038                   // Say who are you?
01039                   Converse( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum, gubSrcSoldierProfile, NPC_WHOAREYOU, 0 );
01040             }
01041       }
01042       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01043       {
01044 
01045       }
01046 }

01049 void TalkPanelNameRegionMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01050 {
01051       // Donot do this if we are talking already
01052       if ( gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ].fTalking )
01053       {
01054             return;
01055       }
01056 
01057       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE)
01058       {
01059             // Set current selected guy....
01060             gTalkPanel.fOnName = TRUE;
01061       }
01062       else if ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01063       {
01064             gTalkPanel.fOnName = FALSE;
01065       }
01066 
01067 }

01071 {
01072       gTalkPanel.fDirtyLevel = fDirtyLevel;
01073 }

01075 
01076 BOOLEAN HandleTalkingMenu( )
01077 {
01078       if ( !gfInTalkPanel )
01079       {
01080             return( FALSE );
01081       }
01082 
01083       if ( gTalkPanel.fHandled )
01084       {
01085             return( HandleTalkingMenuEscape( gTalkPanel.fHandledCanDeleteVal, FALSE ) );
01086       }
01087       
01088       return( FALSE );
01089 }
01090 
01091 
01092 BOOLEAN TalkingMenuDialogue( UINT16 usQuoteNum )
01093 {
01094       // Set back current select....
01095       gTalkPanel.bCurSelect   = -1;
01096       gTalkPanel.fOnName            = FALSE;
01097       //gTalkPanel.fHandled         = FALSE;
01098 
01099       CHECKF( CharacterDialogue( gTalkPanel.ubCharNum, usQuoteNum, gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_NPC_UI, FALSE, FALSE ) != FALSE );     
01100       return( TRUE );
01101 }
01102 
01103 BOOLEAN ProfileCurrentlyTalkingInDialoguePanel( UINT8 ubProfile )
01104 {
01105       if ( gfInTalkPanel )
01106       {
01107             if ( gpDestSoldier != NULL )
01108             {
01109                   if ( gpDestSoldier->ubProfile == ubProfile )
01110                   {
01111                         return( TRUE );
01112                   }
01113             }
01114       }
01115 
01116       return( FALSE );
01117 }
01118 
01119 
01120 BOOLEAN HandleTalkingMenuEscape( BOOLEAN fCanDelete , BOOLEAN fFromEscKey )
01121 {
01122       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
01123       BOOLEAN                             fTalking = FALSE;
01124 
01125       if ( !gfInTalkPanel )
01126       {
01127             return( FALSE );
01128       }
01129 
01130       pFace = &gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ];
01131 
01132       // If we are in the process of speaking, stop this quote an move on...
01133       // If we have been 'handled' by an outside source, check what was our talking value at the time
01134       if ( gTalkPanel.fHandled )
01135       {
01136             fTalking = gTalkPanel.fHandledTalkingVal;
01137       }
01138       else
01139       {
01140             fTalking = pFace->fTalking;
01141       }
01142       
01143 
01144       // Set to false
01145       gTalkPanel.fHandled = FALSE;
01146 
01147       if ( !fFromEscKey )
01148       {
01149             if ( fTalking )
01150             {
01151                   ShutupaYoFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex );
01152             }
01153             // Else if our queue is empty, delete emnu
01154             else 
01155             {
01156                   if ( DialogueQueueIsEmpty( ) && fCanDelete )
01157                   {
01158                         // Delete panel
01159                         DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01160                         // reset records which are on a can-say-once-per-convo basis
01161                         ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForNPC( gpDestSoldier->ubProfile );
01162                         return( TRUE );
01163                   }
01164             }
01165       }
01166       else 
01167       {
01168             if ( DialogueQueueIsEmpty( ) && fCanDelete )
01169             {
01170                   // Delete panel
01171                   DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01172                   // reset records which are on a can-say-once-per-convo basis
01173                   ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForNPC( gpDestSoldier->ubProfile );
01174                   return( TRUE );
01175             }
01176       }
01177       return( FALSE );
01178 }
01179 
01180 void HandleTalkingMenuBackspace( void )
01181 {
01182       FACETYPE                      *pFace;
01183       BOOLEAN                             fTalking = FALSE;
01184 
01185       if ( !gfInTalkPanel )
01186       {
01187             return;
01188       }
01189 
01190       pFace = &gFacesData[ gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex ];
01191 
01192       // If we are in the process of speaking, stop this quote an move on...
01193       // If we have been 'handled' by an outside source, check what was our talking value at the time
01194       /*
01195       if ( gTalkPanel.fHandled )
01196       {
01197             fTalking = gTalkPanel.fHandledTalkingVal;
01198       }
01199       else
01200       {
01201             fTalking = pFace->fTalking;
01202       }
01203       
01204       // Set to false
01205       gTalkPanel.fHandled = FALSE;
01206 
01207 
01208       if ( fTalking )
01209       */
01210       if ( pFace->fTalking )
01211       {
01212             ShutupaYoFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex );
01213       }
01214 }
01215 
01216 void CalculatePopupTextOrientation( INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight )
01217 {
01218       BOOLEAN                 fOKLeft = FALSE, fOKTop = FALSE, fOKBottom = FALSE, fOK = FALSE;
01219       INT16                   sX, sY;
01220 
01221       // Check Left
01222       sX = gTalkPanel.sX - sWidth;
01223 
01224       if ( sX > 0 )
01225       {
01226             fOKLeft = TRUE;
01227       }
01228             
01229       // Check bottom
01230       sY = gTalkPanel.sY + sHeight + gTalkPanel.usHeight;
01231 
01232       if ( sY < INV_INTERFACE_START_Y )
01233       {
01234             fOKBottom = TRUE;
01235       }
01236 
01237       // Check top
01238       sY = gTalkPanel.sY - sHeight;
01239 
01240       if ( sY > gsVIEWPORT_WINDOW_START_Y )
01241       {
01242             fOKTop = TRUE;
01243       }
01244 
01245       // OK, now decide where to put it!
01246 
01247       // First precidence is bottom
01248       if ( fOKBottom )
01249       {
01250             gTalkPanel.ubPopupOrientation = TALK_PANEL_POPUP_BOTTOM;
01251 
01252             fOK = TRUE;
01253       }
01254 
01255       if ( !fOK )
01256       {
01257             // Try left
01258             if ( fOKLeft )
01259             {
01260                   // Our panel should not be heigher than our dialogue talking panel, so don't bother with the height checks!
01261                   gTalkPanel.ubPopupOrientation = TALK_PANEL_POPUP_LEFT;
01262                   fOK = TRUE;
01263             }
01264 
01265       }
01266 
01267       // Now at least top should work
01268       if ( !fOK )
01269       {
01270             // Try top!
01271             if ( fOKTop )
01272             {
01273                   gTalkPanel.ubPopupOrientation = TALK_PANEL_POPUP_TOP;
01274 
01275                   fOK = TRUE;
01276             }
01277       }
01278 
01279       // failed all the above
01280       if( !fOK )
01281       {
01282             // when all else fails go right
01283             gTalkPanel.ubPopupOrientation = TALK_PANEL_POPUP_RIGHT;
01284             fOK = TRUE;
01285 
01286       }
01287       // If we don't have anything here... our viewport/box is too BIG! ( which should never happen
01288       //DebugMsg
01289 }
01290 
01291 
01292 void CalculatePopupTextPosition( INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight )
01293 {
01294       switch( gTalkPanel.ubPopupOrientation )
01295       {
01296             case TALK_PANEL_POPUP_LEFT:
01297 
01298                   // Set it here!
01299                   gTalkPanel.sPopupX = gTalkPanel.sX - sWidth;
01300                   // Center in height!
01301                   gTalkPanel.sPopupY = gTalkPanel.sY + ( gTalkPanel.usHeight / 2 ) -  ( sHeight / 2 );
01302                   break;
01303             case TALK_PANEL_POPUP_RIGHT:
01304                   // Set it here!
01305                   gTalkPanel.sPopupX = gTalkPanel.sX + gTalkPanel.usWidth + 1;
01306                   // Center in height!
01307                   gTalkPanel.sPopupY = gTalkPanel.sY + ( gTalkPanel.usHeight / 2 ) -  ( sHeight / 2 );
01308                   break;
01309             case TALK_PANEL_POPUP_BOTTOM:
01310 
01311                   // Center in X
01312                   gTalkPanel.sPopupX = gTalkPanel.sX + ( gTalkPanel.usWidth / 2 ) - ( sWidth / 2 );
01313                   // Calc height
01314                   gTalkPanel.sPopupY = gTalkPanel.sY + gTalkPanel.usHeight;
01315                   break;
01316 
01317             case TALK_PANEL_POPUP_TOP:
01318 
01319                   // Center in X
01320                   gTalkPanel.sPopupX = gTalkPanel.sX + ( gTalkPanel.usWidth / 2 ) - ( sWidth / 2 );
01321                   // Calc height
01322                   gTalkPanel.sPopupY = gTalkPanel.sY - sHeight;
01323                   break;
01324       }
01325 }

01331

01365 
01366 BOOLEAN SourceSoldierPointerIsValidAndReachableForGive( SOLDIERTYPE * pGiver )
01367 {
01368       INT16       sAdjGridNo;
01369 
01370       if ( !gpSrcSoldier )
01371       {
01372             return( FALSE );
01373       }
01374       if ( !gpSrcSoldier->bActive || !gpSrcSoldier->bInSector )
01375       {
01376             return( FALSE );
01377       }
01378       if ( gpSrcSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || ( gpSrcSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH && gpSrcSoldier->bCollapsed ) )
01379       {
01380             return( FALSE );
01381       }
01382 
01383       if ( !pGiver )
01384       {
01385             return( FALSE );
01386       }
01387 
01388       // pointer should always be valid anyhow
01389       if ( PythSpacesAway( pGiver->sGridNo, gpSrcSoldier->sGridNo ) > MaxDistanceVisible() )
01390       {
01391             return( FALSE );
01392       }
01393 
01394       sAdjGridNo = FindAdjacentGridEx( pGiver, gpSrcSoldier->sGridNo, NULL, NULL, FALSE, FALSE );
01395       if ( sAdjGridNo == -1 )
01396       {
01397             return( FALSE );
01398       }
01399 
01400       return( TRUE );   
01401 }
01402 
01403  
01404 void HandleNPCItemGiven( UINT8 ubNPC, OBJECTTYPE *pObject, INT8 bInvPos )
01405 {
01406 
01407       // Give it to the NPC soldier
01408 //    AutoPlaceObject( gpDestSoldier, pObject, FALSE );
01409 
01410       // OK< if the timer is < 5000, use who was last in the talk panel box.
01411       if ( !SourceSoldierPointerIsValidAndReachableForGive( gpDestSoldier ) )
01412       {
01413             // just drop it
01414 
01415             // have to walk up to the merc closest to ubNPC
01416 
01417             SOLDIERTYPE *           pNPC;
01418 
01419             pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
01420             if ( pNPC )
01421             {
01422                   AddItemToPool( pNPC->sGridNo, &(pNPC->inv[bInvPos]), TRUE, 0, 0, 0 );
01423                   TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( ubNPC, APPROACH_DONE_GIVING_ITEM, TRUE );
01424             }
01425       }
01426       else
01427       {
01428             // Remove dialogue!
01429             DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01430 
01431             // Give this to buddy!
01432             SoldierGiveItem( gpDestSoldier, gpSrcSoldier, pObject, bInvPos );                               
01433       }
01434 
01435 }
01436 
01437 void HandleNPCTriggerNPC( UINT8 ubTargetNPC, UINT8 ubTargetRecord, BOOLEAN fShowDialogueMenu, UINT8 ubTargetApproach )
01438 {
01439       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01440 
01441       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubTargetNPC, FALSE );
01442 
01443       if ( pSoldier == NULL )
01444       {
01445             return;
01446       }
01447 
01448       // Save values for trigger function
01449       gubTargetNPC                        = ubTargetNPC;
01450       gubTargetRecord               = ubTargetRecord;
01451       gubTargetApproach       = ubTargetApproach;
01452       gfShowDialogueMenu      = fShowDialogueMenu;
01453 
01454 
01455       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01456       {
01457             // make sure they are in the right alert status to receive orders (it's a bug that
01458             // this could be set for the player...)
01459             pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
01460             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_ENGAGEDINACTION );
01461       }
01462 
01463       // OH BOY, CHECK IF THIS IS THE SAME PERSON WHO IS ON THE MENU
01464       // RIGHT NOW, IF SO , HANDLE DIRECTLY WITHOUT THIS DELAY!
01465       // IF WE ARE TO DISPLAY MENU AS WELL....
01466       if ( gfInTalkPanel )
01467       {
01468             if ( gpDestSoldier == pSoldier && fShowDialogueMenu )
01469             {
01470                   HandleNPCTrigger( );
01471                   return;
01472             }
01473       }
01474 
01475       if ( fShowDialogueMenu )
01476       {
01477 
01478             // ALRIGHTY, NOW DO THIS!
01479             // WAIT IN NON-INTERACTIVE MODE UNTIL TIMER IS DONE 
01480             // SO WE CAN SEE NPC RADIO LOCATOR
01481             // THEN AFTER THIS IS DONE, DO THE STUFF
01482             // Setup timer!
01483             gfWaitingForTriggerTimer            = TRUE;
01484             guiWaitingForTriggerTime            = GetJA2Clock( );
01485 
01486             // Setup locator!
01487             ShowRadioLocator( (UINT8)pSoldier->ubID, SHOW_LOCATOR_FAST );
01488 
01489             // If he's visible, locate...
01490             if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
01491             {
01492                   LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
01493             }
01494 
01495             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_BEGINUILOCK;
01496 
01497       }
01498       else
01499       {
01500             HandleNPCTrigger( );
01501       }
01502 
01503       // Being already here, we know that this is not the guy whose panel is up.
01504       // Only close the panel if dialogue is involved in the new record.
01505       if ( RecordHasDialogue( ubTargetNPC, ubTargetRecord ) )
01506       {
01507             // Shutdown any panel we had up...
01508             DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01509       }
01510 }
01511 
01512 void HandleNPCTrigger( )
01513 {
01514       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01515       INT16                   sPlayerGridNo;
01516       UINT8                   ubPlayerID;
01517 
01518       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( gubTargetNPC, FALSE );
01519       if (!pSoldier)
01520       {
01521             return;
01522       }
01523 
01524       if ( gfInTalkPanel )
01525       {
01526             if ( pSoldier == gpDestSoldier )    
01527             {
01528                   if ( gfShowDialogueMenu )
01529                   {
01530                         // Converse another way!
01531                         Converse( gubTargetNPC, NO_PROFILE, gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );
01532                   }
01533                   else if (gpSrcSoldier != NULL) // if we can, reinitialize menu
01534                   {
01535                         InitiateConversation( gpDestSoldier, gpSrcSoldier, gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );
01536                   }
01537             }
01538             else
01539             {
01540                   Converse( gubTargetNPC, NO_PROFILE, gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );
01541             }
01542       }
01543       else
01544       {
01545             // Now start new one...
01546             if ( gfShowDialogueMenu )
01547             {
01548                   if ( SourceSoldierPointerIsValidAndReachableForGive( pSoldier ) )
01549                   {
01550                               InitiateConversation( pSoldier, gpSrcSoldier, gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );
01551                               return;                 
01552                   }
01553                   else
01554                   {
01555                         sPlayerGridNo = ClosestPC( pSoldier, NULL );
01556                         if (sPlayerGridNo != NOWHERE )
01557                         {
01558                               ubPlayerID = WhoIsThere2( sPlayerGridNo, 0 );
01559                               if (ubPlayerID != NOBODY)
01560                               {
01561                                     InitiateConversation( pSoldier, MercPtrs[ ubPlayerID ], gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );                     
01562                                     return;
01563                               }
01564                         }
01565                   }
01566                   // else
01567                   InitiateConversation( pSoldier, pSoldier, gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );
01568             }
01569             else
01570             {
01571                   // Converse another way!
01572                   Converse( gubTargetNPC, NO_PROFILE, gubTargetApproach, gubTargetRecord );
01573             }
01574       }
01575 
01576 }
01577 
01578 
01579 void HandleWaitTimerForNPCTrigger( )
01580 {
01581       if ( gfWaitingForTriggerTimer )
01582       {
01583             if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiWaitingForTriggerTime ) > 500 )
01584             {
01585                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
01586 
01587                   UIHandleLUIEndLock( NULL );
01588 
01589                   HandleNPCTrigger( );
01590 
01591                   gfWaitingForTriggerTimer = FALSE;
01592             }
01593 
01594       }
01595 
01596 }
01597 
01598 
01599 
01600 void HandleNPCGotoGridNo( UINT8 ubTargetNPC, UINT16 usGridNo, UINT8 ubQuoteNum )
01601 {
01602       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
01603       // OK, Move to gridNo!
01604 
01605       // Shotdown any panel we had up...
01606       DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01607 
01608       // Get merc id for NPC
01609       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubTargetNPC, FALSE );
01610       if ( !pSoldier )
01611       {
01612             return;
01613       }
01614 
01615       // zap any delay in this soldier
01616       ZEROTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->AICounter );
01617       if (pSoldier->bNextAction == AI_ACTION_WAIT)
01618       {
01619             pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
01620             pSoldier->usNextActionData = 0;
01621       }
01622 
01623       // if player controlled, set under AI control flag
01624       if (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
01625       {
01626             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_PCUNDERAICONTROL;
01627       }
01628 
01629       // OK, set in motion!
01630       pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_WALK;
01631 
01632       // Set dest!
01633       pSoldier->usNextActionData = usGridNo;
01634 
01635       // UNless he's has a pending action, delete what he was doing!
01636       // Cancel anything he was doing
01637       if ( pSoldier->bAction != AI_ACTION_PENDING_ACTION )
01638       {
01639             CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
01640       }
01641       // Go for it!
01642 
01643       // Set flags to do stuff once there...
01644       pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord       = ( ubQuoteNum + 1 );
01645       pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID = ActionIDForMovementRecord( ubTargetNPC, ubQuoteNum );
01646       
01647       // Set absolute dest
01648       pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination = usGridNo;
01649 
01650       // handle this guy's AI right away so that we can get him moving
01651       pSoldier->fAIFlags |= AI_HANDLE_EVERY_FRAME;
01652 }
01653 
01654 void HandleNPCClosePanel(  )
01655 {
01656       // Remove dialogue!
01657       DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01658 }

01660 void HandleStuffForNPCEscorted( UINT8 ubNPC )
01661 {
01662       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
01663 
01664       switch( ubNPC )
01665       {
01666             case MARIA:
01667                   break;
01668             case JOEY:
01669                   break;
01670             case SKYRIDER:
01671                   SetFactTrue( FACT_SKYRIDER_EVER_ESCORTED );
01672                   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_ESCORT_SKYRIDER ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01673                   {
01674                         StartQuest( QUEST_ESCORT_SKYRIDER, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01675                   }
01676                   break;
01677             case JOHN:
01678                   // recruit Mary as well
01679                   RecruitEPC( MARY );
01680 
01681                   pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARY, TRUE );
01682                   if ( pSoldier )
01683                   {
01684                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NOW_BING_ESCORTED_STR ], gMercProfiles[ MARY ].zNickname, ( pSoldier->bAssignment + 1 ) );
01685                   }
01686 
01687                   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_ESCORT_TOURISTS ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01688                   {
01689                         StartQuest( QUEST_ESCORT_TOURISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01690                   }
01691                   break;
01692             case MARY:
01693                   // recruit John as well
01694                   RecruitEPC( JOHN );
01695 
01696                   pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( JOHN, TRUE );
01697                   if ( pSoldier )
01698                   {
01699                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NOW_BING_ESCORTED_STR ], gMercProfiles[ JOHN ].zNickname, ( pSoldier->bAssignment + 1 ) );
01700                   }
01701 
01702                   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_ESCORT_TOURISTS ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED )
01703                   {
01704                         StartQuest( QUEST_ESCORT_TOURISTS, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01705                   }
01706                   break;
01707       }
01708 }

01735 
01736 void HandleNPCDoAction( UINT8 ubTargetNPC, UINT16 usActionCode, UINT8 ubQuoteNum )
01737 {
01738       INT32                                                       cnt;
01739       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier, *pSoldier2;
01740       INT8                                                        bNumDone = 0;
01741       INT16                                                       sGridNo = NOWHERE, sAdjustedGridNo;
01742       INT8                                                        bItemIn;
01743       UINT8                                                       ubDesiredMercDir;
01744       EXITGRID                                              ExitGrid;
01745       INT32 iRandom = 0;
01746       UINT8                                                       ubMineIndex;
01747 
01748 
01749       pSoldier2 = NULL;
01750       //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Handling %s, action %d at %ld", gMercProfiles[ ubTargetNPC ].zNickname, usActionCode, GetJA2Clock() );
01751 
01752       // Switch on action code!
01753       if (usActionCode > NPC_ACTION_TURN_TO_FACE_NEAREST_MERC && usActionCode < NPC_ACTION_LAST_TURN_TO_FACE_PROFILE)
01754       {
01755             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubTargetNPC, FALSE );
01756             pSoldier2 = FindSoldierByProfileID( (UINT8) (usActionCode - NPC_ACTION_TURN_TO_FACE_NEAREST_MERC), FALSE );
01757             if (pSoldier && pSoldier2)
01758             {
01759                   // see if we are facing this person
01760                   ubDesiredMercDir = atan8(CenterX(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterY(pSoldier->sGridNo),CenterX(pSoldier2->sGridNo),CenterY(pSoldier2->sGridNo));
01761                   // if not already facing in that direction,
01762                   if (pSoldier->bDirection != ubDesiredMercDir)
01763                   {
01764                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, ubDesiredMercDir );
01765                   }
01766             }
01767       }
01768       else
01769       {
01770             switch( usActionCode )
01771             {
01772                   case NPC_ACTION_DONT_ACCEPT_ITEM:
01773                         // do nothing; this is just to skip annoying debug msgs
01774                         break;
01775 
01776                   case NPC_ACTION_GOTO_HIDEOUT:
01777 
01778                         // OK, we want to goto the basement level!
01779 
01780                         //DEF: First thing, Add the exit grid to the map temps file
01781             
01782                         ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX = 10;
01783                         ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY = 1;
01784                         ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ = 1;
01785                         ExitGrid.usGridNo = 12722;
01786       
01787                         ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( TRUE );
01788                         AddExitGridToWorld( 7887, &ExitGrid );
01789                         ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile( FALSE );
01790 
01791                         // For one, loop through our current squad and move them over
01792                         cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
01793 
01794                         //ATE:Alrighty, instead of being a dufuss here, let's actually use the current
01795                         // Squad here to search for...
01796 
01797                         // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01798                         for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
01799                         {       
01800                               // Are we in this sector, On the current squad?
01801                               if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( ) )
01802                               {
01803                                     gfTacticalTraversal = TRUE;
01804                                     SetGroupSectorValue( 10, 1, 1, pSoldier->ubGroupID );
01805 
01806                                     // Set insertion gridno
01807                                     if ( bNumDone < 6 )
01808                                     {
01809                                           // Set next sectore
01810                                           pSoldier->sSectorX = 10;
01811                                           pSoldier->sSectorY = 1;
01812                                           pSoldier->bSectorZ = 1;
01813 
01814                                           // Set gridno
01815                                           pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
01816                                           pSoldier->usStrategicInsertionData = sBasementEnterGridNos[ bNumDone ];
01817                                     }
01818                                     bNumDone++;
01819                               }
01820                         }
01821 
01822                         // MOVE NPCS!
01823                         // Fatima
01824 /*                      gMercProfiles[ 101 ].sSectorX = 10;
01825                         gMercProfiles[ 101 ].sSectorY = 1;
01826                         gMercProfiles[ 101 ].bSectorZ = 1;
01827 */
01828                         ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( FATIMA, 10, 1, 1 );
01829 
01830                         // Dimitri
01831 /*                      gMercProfiles[ 60 ].sSectorX = 10;
01832                         gMercProfiles[ 60 ].sSectorY = 1;
01833                         gMercProfiles[ 60 ].bSectorZ = 1;
01834 */
01835                         ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( DIMITRI, 10, 1, 1 );
01836 
01837                         gFadeOutDoneCallback = DoneFadeOutActionBasement;
01838 
01839                         FadeOutGameScreen( );
01840                         break;
01841 
01842                   case NPC_ACTION_FATIMA_GIVE_LETTER:
01843                         
01844                         // Delete menu, give item to megual
01845                         DeleteTalkingMenu( );
01846 
01847                         // Get pointer for Fatima
01848                         pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( 101, FALSE );

03672                         // find doctors available and trigger record 12 or 13
03673                         pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( STEVE, FALSE ); // Steve Willis, 80
03674                         if (pSoldier)
03675                         {
03676                               if ( !pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bInSector || !(pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM) || !(pSoldier->bNeutral) || (pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE) )
03677                               {
03678                                     pSoldier = NULL;
03679                               }
03680                         }
03681 
03682                         pSoldier2 = FindSoldierByProfileID( VINCE, FALSE ); // Vince, 69
03683                         if (pSoldier2)
03684                         {
03685                               if ( !pSoldier2->bActive || !pSoldier2->bInSector || !(pSoldier2->bTeam == CIV_TEAM) || !(pSoldier2->bNeutral) || (pSoldier2->bLife < OKLIFE) )
03686                               {
03687                                     pSoldier2 = NULL;
03688                               }
03689                         }
03690 
03691                         if ( pSoldier == NULL && pSoldier2 == NULL )
03692                         {
03693                               // uh oh
03694                               break;
03695                         }
03696 
03697                         if( ( pSoldier ) && ( pSoldier2 ) )
03698                         {
03699                               if( pSoldier->sGridNo == 10343 )
03700                               {     
03701                                     pSoldier2 = NULL;
03702                               }
03703                               else if( pSoldier2->sGridNo == 10343 )
03704                               {
03705                                     pSoldier = NULL; 
03706                               }
03707                         }
03708 
03709                         if ( pSoldier && pSoldier2 )
03710                         {
03711                               // both doctors available... turn one off randomly
03712                               if ( Random( 2 ) )
03713                               {
03714                                     pSoldier = NULL;
03715                               }
03716                               else
03717                               {
03718                                     pSoldier2 = NULL;
03719                               }
03720                         }
03721                         
03722                         // only one pointer left...
03723 
03724                         if ( pSoldier )
03725                         {
03726                               TriggerNPCRecord( ubTargetNPC, 12 );
03727                         }
03728                         else
03729                         {
03730                               TriggerNPCRecord( ubTargetNPC, 13 );
03731                         }
03732                         
03733                         break;

03735                   case NPC_ACTION_INVOKE_CONVERSATION_MODE:

03738                               INT16       sNearestPC;
03739                               UINT8       ubID;
03740 
03741                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubTargetNPC, FALSE );
03742                               if ( pSoldier )
03743                               {
03744                                     pSoldier2 = NULL;
03745 
03746                                     sNearestPC = ClosestPC( pSoldier, NULL );
03747                                     if ( sNearestPC != NOWHERE )
03748                                     {
03749                                           ubID = WhoIsThere2( sNearestPC, 0 );
03750                                           if (ubID != NOBODY)
03751                                           {
03752                                                 pSoldier2 = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
03753                                           }
03754                                     }
03755 
03756                                     if ( pSoldier2 )
03757                                     {

03759                                     }
03760                               }

04129                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_DAVE, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
04130                         break;
04131                   case NPC_ACTION_HISTORY_PABLO:
04132                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_PABLO, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
04133                         break;
04134                   case NPC_ACTION_HISTORY_KINGPIN_MONEY:
04135                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_KINGPIN_MONEY, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
04136                         break;
04137                   case NPC_ACTION_SEND_TROOPS_TO_SAM:
04138                         break;
04139                   case NPC_ACTION_PUT_PACOS_IN_BASEMENT:
04140                         gMercProfiles[ PACOS ].sSectorX = 10;
04141                         gMercProfiles[ PACOS ].sSectorY = MAP_ROW_A;
04142                         gMercProfiles[ PACOS ].bSectorZ = 0;
04143                         break;
04144                   case NPC_ACTION_HISTORY_ASSASSIN:
04145                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_ASSASSIN, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
04146                         break;
04147                   case NPC_ACTION_TRIGGER_HANS_BY_ROOM:
04148                         {                             
04149                               if ( gpSrcSoldier )
04150                               {
04151                                     UINT8 ubRoom;
04152 
04153                                     if ( InARoom( gpSrcSoldier->sGridNo, &ubRoom ) && (ubRoom == 49) )
04154                                     {
04155                                           TriggerNPCRecord( HANS, 18 );
04156                                     }
04157                                     else
04158                                     {
04159                                           TriggerNPCRecord( HANS, 14 );
04160                                     }
04161 
04162                               }
04163                         }
04164                         break;
04165                   case  NPC_ACTION_TRIGGER_MADLAB_31:
04166                         if ( PlayerTeamFull( ) )
04167                         {
04168                               DeleteTalkingMenu( );
04169                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_RECRUIT_TEAM_FULL ] );
04170                         }
04171                         else
04172                         {
04173                               TriggerNPCRecord( MADLAB, 31 );
04174                         }
04175                         break;
04176                   case NPC_ACTION_TRIGGER_MADLAB_32:
04177                         if ( PlayerTeamFull( ) )
04178                         {
04179                               DeleteTalkingMenu( );
04180                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_RECRUIT_TEAM_FULL ] );
04181                         }
04182                         else
04183                         {
04184                               TriggerNPCRecord( MADLAB, 32 );
04185                         }
04186                         break;
04187                   case NPC_ACTION_TRIGGER_BREWSTER_BY_WARDEN_PROXIMITY:
04188                         pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( BREWSTER, FALSE );
04189                         if ( pSoldier )
04190                         {
04191                               sGridNo = GetGridNoOfCorpseGivenProfileID( WARDEN );
04192                               if ( sGridNo != NOWHERE && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo ) <= 10 )
04193                               {
04194                                     TriggerNPCRecord( BREWSTER, 16 );
04195                               }
04196                               else
04197                               {
04198                                     TriggerNPCRecord( BREWSTER, 17 );
04199                               }
04200                         }
04201                         break;
04202                   case NPC_ACTION_FILL_UP_CAR:
04203                         pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( PROF_HUMMER, TRUE );
04204                         if ( !pSoldier )
04205                         {
04206                               // ice cream truck?
04207                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( PROF_ICECREAM, TRUE );
04208                         }
04209                         else if ( pSoldier->sBreathRed == 10000 )
04210                         {
04211                               pSoldier2 = FindSoldierByProfileID( PROF_ICECREAM, TRUE );
04212                               if ( pSoldier2 )
04213                               {
04214                                     // try refueling this vehicle instead
04215                                     pSoldier = pSoldier2;
04216                               }
04217                         }
04218                         if ( pSoldier )
04219                         {
04220                               pSoldier->sBreathRed = 10000;
04221                               pSoldier->bBreath    = 100;
04222                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, gzLateLocalizedString[ 50 ] );
04223                         }
04224                         break;
04225                   case NPC_ACTION_WALTER_GIVEN_MONEY_INITIALLY:
04226                         if ( gMercProfiles[ WALTER ].iBalance >= WALTER_BRIBE_AMOUNT )
04227                         {
04228                               TriggerNPCRecord( WALTER, 16 );
04229                         }
04230                         else
04231                         {
04232                               TriggerNPCRecord( WALTER, 14 );
04233                         }
04234                         break;
04235                   case NPC_ACTION_WALTER_GIVEN_MONEY:
04236                         if ( gMercProfiles[ WALTER ].iBalance >= WALTER_BRIBE_AMOUNT )
04237                         {
04238                               TriggerNPCRecord( WALTER, 16 );
04239                         }
04240                         else
04241                         {
04242                               TriggerNPCRecord( WALTER, 15 );
04243                         }
04244                         break;
04245                   default:
04246                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_RED, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"No code support for NPC action %d", usActionCode );
04247                         break;
04248             }
04249       }
04250 }
04251 
04252 UINT32 CalcPatientMedicalCost( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
04253 {
04254       UINT32      uiCost;
04255 
04256       if ( !pSoldier )
04257       {
04258             return( 0 );
04259       }
04260 
04261       if ( pSoldier->bHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_FREEBIE || pSoldier->bHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_RANDOM_FREEBIE )
04262       {
04263             return( 0 );
04264       }
04265             
04266       uiCost = 10 * ( pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife );
04267 
04268       if ( pSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
04269       {
04270             // charge additional $25 for every point below OKLIFE he is
04271             uiCost += ( 25 * ( OKLIFE - pSoldier->bLife ) );
04272       }
04273 
04274       // also charge $2 for each point of bleeding that must be stopped
04275       if ( pSoldier->bBleeding > 0 )
04276       {
04277             uiCost += ( 2 * pSoldier->bBleeding );
04278       }
04279 
04280       if ( pSoldier->bHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_BREAK )
04281       {
04282             uiCost = (uiCost * 85) / 100;
04283       }
04284       else if ( pSoldier->bHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_COST )
04285       {
04286             // 30% discount
04287             uiCost = (uiCost * 70) / 100;
04288       }
04289       else if ( pSoldier->bHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_UNSET )
04290       {
04291             if ( gbHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_BREAK )
04292             {
04293                   // 15% discount
04294                   uiCost = (uiCost * 85) / 100;
04295             }
04296             else if ( gbHospitalPriceModifier == HOSPITAL_COST )
04297             {
04298                   // 30% discount
04299                   uiCost = (uiCost * 70) / 100;
04300             }
04301       }
04302 
04303       return( uiCost );
04304 }
04305 
04306 UINT32 CalcMedicalCost( UINT8 ubId )
04307 {
04308       INT32       cnt;
04309       UINT32      uiCostSoFar;
04310       INT16       sGridNo = 0;
04311       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, *pNPC;
04312 
04313       uiCostSoFar = 0;
04314 
04315       // find the doctor's soldiertype to get his position
04316       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubId, FALSE );
04317       if (!pNPC)
04318       {
04319             return( 0 );
04320       }
04321 
04322       sGridNo = pNPC->sGridNo;
04323 
04324       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++)
04325       {
04326             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
04327             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_HOSPITAL )
04328             {
04329                   if ( pSoldier->bLife < pSoldier->bLifeMax )
04330                   {
04331                         if (PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) <= HOSPITAL_PATIENT_DISTANCE)
04332                         {
04333                               uiCostSoFar += CalcPatientMedicalCost( pSoldier );
04334                         }
04335                   }
04336             }
04337       }
04338 
04339       // round up to nearest 10 dollars
04340       uiCostSoFar = ( (uiCostSoFar + 9) / 10 );
04341       uiCostSoFar *= 10;
04342 
04343       // always ask for at least $10
04344       uiCostSoFar = __max( 10, uiCostSoFar );
04345 
04346       return( uiCostSoFar );
04347 }
04348 
04349 BOOLEAN PlayerTeamHasTwoSpotsLeft( )
04350 {
04351       UINT32                              cnt, uiCount = 0;
04352       SOLDIERTYPE        *pSoldier;
04353 
04354       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= (UINT32)( gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID - 2 ); cnt++, pSoldier++ )
04355       {
04356             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
04357             {
04358                   uiCount++;
04359             }
04360       }
04361 
04362       if ( uiCount <= (UINT32) (gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID - 2) - 2 )
04363       {
04364             return( TRUE );
04365       }
04366       else
04367       {
04368             return( FALSE );
04369       }
04370 }
04371
