04373 
04374 void StartDialogueMessageBox( UINT8 ubProfileID, UINT16 usMessageBoxType )
04375 {
04376       INT32             iTemp;
04377       UINT16            zTemp[256], zTemp2[256];
04378 
04379       gusDialogueMessageBoxType = usMessageBoxType;
04380       switch( gusDialogueMessageBoxType )
04381       {
04382             case NPC_ACTION_ASK_ABOUT_ESCORTING_EPC:
04383                   if ( (ubProfileID == JOHN && gMercProfiles[ MARY ].bMercStatus != MERC_IS_DEAD) || (ubProfileID == MARY && gMercProfiles[ JOHN ].bMercStatus != MERC_IS_DEAD) )
04384                   {
04385                         swprintf( zTemp, gzLateLocalizedString[59] );
04386                   }
04387                   else
04388                   {
04389                         swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ ESCORT_PROMPT ], gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].zNickname );
04390                   }
04391                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04392                   break;
04393             case NPC_ACTION_ASK_ABOUT_PAYING_RPC:
04394             case NPC_ACTION_ASK_ABOUT_PAYING_RPC_WITH_DAILY_SALARY:
04395             case NPC_ACTION_REDUCE_CONRAD_SALARY_CONDITIONS:
04396                   swprintf( zTemp2, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].sSalary );
04397                   InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp2 );
04398                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ HIRE_PROMPT ], gMercProfiles[ubProfileID].zNickname, zTemp2 );
04399                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04400                   break;
04401             case NPC_ACTION_DARREN_REQUESTOR:
04402             case NPC_ACTION_FIGHT_AGAIN_REQUESTOR:
04403                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ BOXING_PROMPT ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04404                   break;
04405             case NPC_ACTION_BUY_LEATHER_KEVLAR_VEST:
04406                   swprintf( zTemp2, L"%d", Item[LEATHER_JACKET_W_KEVLAR].usPrice );
04407                   InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp2 );
04408                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ BUY_VEST_PROMPT ], ItemNames[LEATHER_JACKET_W_KEVLAR], zTemp2 );
04409                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04410                   break;
04411             case NPC_ACTION_PROMPT_PLAYER_TO_LIE:
04412                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, TacticalStr[ YESNOLIE_STR ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNOLIE, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04413                   break;
04414             case NPC_ACTION_MEDICAL_REQUESTOR_2:
04415                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ FREE_MEDICAL_PROMPT ] );
04416                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04417                   break;
04418             case NPC_ACTION_MEDICAL_REQUESTOR:
04419                   iTemp = (INT32) CalcMedicalCost( ubProfileID );
04420                   if ( giHospitalRefund > iTemp )
04421                   {
04422                         iTemp = 10;
04423                   }
04424                   else
04425                   {
04426                         iTemp -= giHospitalRefund;
04427                   }
04428                   swprintf( zTemp2, L"%ld", iTemp );
04429                   InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp2 );
04430                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ PAY_MONEY_PROMPT ], zTemp2 );
04431 
04432                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04433                   break;
04434             case NPC_ACTION_BUY_VEHICLE_REQUESTOR:
04435                   swprintf( zTemp2, L"%ld", 10000 );
04436                   InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp2 );
04437                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ PAY_MONEY_PROMPT ], zTemp2 );
04438 
04439                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04440                   break;
04441             case NPC_ACTION_TRIGGER_MARRY_DARYL_PROMPT:
04442                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ MARRY_DARYL_PROMPT ] );
04443                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04444                   break;
04445             case NPC_ACTION_KROTT_REQUESTOR:
04446                   swprintf( zTemp, TacticalStr[ SPARE_KROTT_PROMPT ] );
04447                   DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, zTemp, GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, DialogueMessageBoxCallBack, NULL );
04448                   break;
04449             default:
04450                   break;
04451       }
04452 }
04453 
04454 
04455 void DialogueMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 ubExitValue )
04456 {
04457       UINT8                               ubProfile;
04458       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
04459 
04460       ubProfile = gpDestSoldier->ubProfile;
04461 
04462       switch( gusDialogueMessageBoxType )
04463       {
04464             case NPC_ACTION_ASK_ABOUT_ESCORTING_EPC:
04465                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04466                   {
04467                         // Delete menu
04468                         DeleteTalkingMenu( );
04469 
04470                         if ( PlayerTeamFull() )
04471                         {
04472                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_RECRUIT_TEAM_FULL ] );
04473                         }
04474                         else
04475                         {
04476                               if ( ubProfile == JOHN )
04477                               {
04478                                     // Mary might be alive, and if so we need to ensure two places
04479                                     pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARY, TRUE );
04480                                     if ( pSoldier && !PlayerTeamHasTwoSpotsLeft() )
04481                                     {
04482                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ CANNOT_RECRUIT_TEAM_FULL ] );                                        
04483                                           break;
04484                                     }
04485                               }
04486 
04487                               RecruitEPC( ubProfile );
04488 
04489                               // Get soldier pointer
04490                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubProfile, FALSE );
04491                               if ( !pSoldier )
04492                               {
04493                                     return;
04494                               }
04495 
04496                               // OK, update UI with message that we have been recruited
04497                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NOW_BING_ESCORTED_STR ], gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ].zNickname, ( pSoldier->bAssignment + 1 ) );
04498 
04499                               // Change Squads....
04500                               SetCurrentSquad( pSoldier ->bAssignment, FALSE );
04501 
04502                               HandleStuffForNPCEscorted( ubProfile );
04503                         }
04504                   }
04505                   break;
04506             case NPC_ACTION_ASK_ABOUT_PAYING_RPC:
04507             case NPC_ACTION_ASK_ABOUT_PAYING_RPC_WITH_DAILY_SALARY:
04508                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04509                   {
04510                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 1 );
04511                   }
04512                   else
04513                   {
04514                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 0 );
04515                   }
04516                   break;
04517             case NPC_ACTION_REDUCE_CONRAD_SALARY_CONDITIONS:
04518                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04519                   {
04520                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 1 );
04521                   }
04522                   else
04523                   {
04524                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 2 );
04525                   }
04526                   break;
04527                   break;
04528             case NPC_ACTION_DARREN_REQUESTOR:
04529                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04530                   {
04531                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 13 );
04532                   }
04533                   else
04534                   {
04535                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 12 );
04536                   }
04537                   break;
04538             case NPC_ACTION_FIGHT_AGAIN_REQUESTOR:
04539                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04540                   {
04541                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 30 );
04542                   }
04543                   else
04544                   {
04545                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 12 );
04546                   }
04547                   break;
04548             case NPC_ACTION_BUY_LEATHER_KEVLAR_VEST:
04549                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04550                   {
04551                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 27 );
04552                   }
04553                   else
04554                   {
04555                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, 28 );
04556                   }
04557                   break;
04558             case NPC_ACTION_PROMPT_PLAYER_TO_LIE:
04559                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04560                   {
04561                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, (UINT8)( ubRecordThatTriggeredLiePrompt + 1 ) );
04562                   }
04563                   else if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO )
04564                   {
04565                         TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, (UINT8)( ubRecordThatTriggeredLiePrompt + 2 ) );
04566                   }
04567                   else
04568                   {
04569                         // He tried to lie.....
04570                         // Find the best conscious merc with a chance....
04571                         UINT8                                     cnt;
04572                         SOLDIERTYPE *                 pLier = NULL;
04573                         SOLDIERTYPE *                 pSoldier;
04574 
04575                         cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
04576                         for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++ )
04577                         {       
04578                               if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bBreath >= OKBREATH )
04579                               {
04580                                     if (!pLier || (EffectiveWisdom( pSoldier ) + EffectiveLeadership( pSoldier ) > EffectiveWisdom( pLier ) + EffectiveLeadership( pSoldier ) ) )
04581                                     {
04582                                           pLier = pSoldier;
04583                                     }
04584                               }
04585                         }
04586 
04587                         if ( pLier && SkillCheck( pLier, LIE_TO_QUEEN_CHECK, 0 ) >= 0 )
04588                         {
04589                               // SUCCESS..
04590                               TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, (UINT8)( ubRecordThatTriggeredLiePrompt + 4 ) );
04591                         }
04592                         else
04593                         {
04594                               // NAUGHY BOY
04595                               TriggerNPCRecord( ubProfile, (UINT8)( ubRecordThatTriggeredLiePrompt + 3 ) );
04596                         }
04597                   }
04598                   break;
04599             case NPC_ACTION_MEDICAL_REQUESTOR:
04600             case NPC_ACTION_MEDICAL_REQUESTOR_2:
04601                   if (ubProfile == VINCE)
04602                   {
04603                         if ( gusDialogueMessageBoxType == NPC_ACTION_MEDICAL_REQUESTOR )
04604                         {
04605                               if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04606                               {
04607                                     // give the guy the cash
04608                                     TriggerNPCRecord( VINCE, 23 );
04609                               }
04610                               else
04611                               {
04612                                     // no cash, no help
04613                                     TriggerNPCRecord( VINCE, 24 );
04614                               }
04615                         }
04616                         else
04617                         {
04618                               if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04619                               {
04620                                     //HandleNPCDoAction( VINCE, NPC_ACTION_CHECK_DOCTORING_MONEY_GIVEN, 0 );
04621                                     if ( CheckFact( FACT_WOUNDED_MERCS_NEARBY, VINCE) )
04622                                     {
04623                                           TriggerNPCRecord( VINCE, 26 );
04624                                     }
04625                                     else if(  CheckFact( FACT_ONE_WOUNDED_MERC_NEARBY, VINCE ) )
04626                                     {
04627                                           TriggerNPCRecord( VINCE, 25 );
04628                                     }
04629                                     giHospitalTempBalance = 0;
04630                               }
04631                               else
04632                               {
04633                                     // just don't want the help
04634                                     TriggerNPCRecord( VINCE, 34 );
04635                               }
04636                         }
04637 
04638                         DeleteTalkingMenu();
04639                   }
04640                   else // Steven Willis
04641                   {
04642                         if( gusDialogueMessageBoxType == NPC_ACTION_MEDICAL_REQUESTOR )
04643                         {
04644                               if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04645                               {
04646                                     // give the guy the cash
04647                                     TriggerNPCRecord( STEVE, 23 );
04648                               }
04649                               else
04650                               {
04651                                     // no cahs, no help
04652                                     TriggerNPCRecord( STEVE, 24 );
04653                               }
04654                         }
04655                         else
04656                         {
04657                               if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04658                               {
04659                                     //HandleNPCDoAction( STEVE, NPC_ACTION_CHECK_DOCTORING_MONEY_GIVEN, 0 );
04660                                     if ( CheckFact( FACT_WOUNDED_MERCS_NEARBY, STEVE) )
04661                                     {
04662                                           TriggerNPCRecord( STEVE, 26 );
04663                                     }
04664                                     else if(  CheckFact( FACT_ONE_WOUNDED_MERC_NEARBY, STEVE ) )
04665                                     {
04666                                           TriggerNPCRecord( STEVE, 25 );
04667                                     }
04668                                     gMercProfiles[ VINCE ].iBalance = 0;
04669                               }
04670                               else
04671                               {
04672                                     // just don't want the help
04673                                     TriggerNPCRecord( STEVE, 30 );
04674                               }
04675                         }
04676 
04677                         DeleteTalkingMenu();
04678                   }
04679                   break;
04680             case NPC_ACTION_BUY_VEHICLE_REQUESTOR:
04681                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04682                   {
04683                         TriggerNPCRecord( GERARD, 9 ); // Dave Gerard
04684                   }
04685                   else
04686                   {
04687                         TriggerNPCRecord( GERARD, 8 );
04688                   }
04689                   break;
04690             case NPC_ACTION_KROTT_REQUESTOR:
04691                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04692                   {
04693                         TriggerNPCRecord( SERGEANT, 7 );
04694                   }
04695                   else
04696                   {
04697                         TriggerNPCRecord( SERGEANT, 6 );
04698                   }
04699                   break;
04700             case NPC_ACTION_TRIGGER_MARRY_DARYL_PROMPT:
04701                   gMercProfiles[ gpSrcSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags2 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_ASKED_BY_HICKS;
04702                   if ( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
04703                   {
04704                         gMercProfiles[ DARYL ].bNPCData = (INT8) gpSrcSoldier->ubProfile;
04705 
04706                         // create key for Daryl to give to player
04707                         pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( DARYL, FALSE );
04708                         if ( pSoldier )
04709                         {
04710                               OBJECTTYPE Key;
04711 
04712                               CreateKeyObject( &Key, 1, 38 );
04713                               AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &Key, FALSE );
04714                         }
04715                         TriggerNPCRecord( DARYL, 11 );
04716                   }
04717                   else
04718                   {
04719                         TriggerNPCRecord( DARYL, 12 );
04720                   }
04721                   break;
04722             default:
04723                   break;
04724       }
04725 }

04728 void  DoneFadeOutActionBasement( )
04729 {
04730       // OK, insertion data found, enter sector!
04731       SetCurrentWorldSector( 10, 1, 1 );
04732

04736       gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = NULL;

04742

04744       AddStructToUnLoadedMapTempFile( 7887, DEBRIS2MISC1, 10, 1, 0 );
04745

04748 
04749       FadeInGameScreen( );
04750

04759 void  DoneFadeInActionBasement( )
04760 {
04761       // Start conversation, etc
04762       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, *pNPCSoldier;
04763       INT32                                                       cnt;
04764 
04765       // Look for someone to talk to
04766       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
04767       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
04768       for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
04769       {       
04770             // Are we in this sector, On the current squad?
04771             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bAssignment == CurrentSquad( ) )
04772             {
04773                   break;
04774             }
04775 
04776       }
04777 
04778       // Get merc id for carlos!
04779       pNPCSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( 58, FALSE );
04780       if ( !pNPCSoldier )
04781       {
04782             return;
04783       }
04784 
04785 
04786       // Converse!
04787       //InitiateConversation( pNPCSoldier, pSoldier, 0, 1 );
04788       TriggerNPCRecordImmediately( pNPCSoldier->ubProfile, 1 );
04789 
04790 
04791 }

04816 
04817 BOOLEAN NPCOpenThing( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fDoor )
04818 {
04819       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure;
04820       INT16                                     sStructGridNo;
04821       INT16                                     sActionGridNo;
04822       UINT8                                     ubDirection;
04823       INT16                                     sGridNo;
04824       DOOR *                                    pDoor;
04825 
04826       // Find closest door and get struct data for it!
04827       if ( fDoor )
04828       {
04829             sStructGridNo = FindClosestDoor( pSoldier );
04830 
04831             if ( sStructGridNo == NOWHERE )
04832             {
04833                   return( FALSE );
04834             }
04835 
04836             pStructure = FindStructure( sStructGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
04837       }
04838       else
04839       {
04840             // for Armand, hard code to tile 6968
04841             if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == ARMAND )
04842             {
04843                   sStructGridNo = 6968;
04844             }
04845             else
04846             {
04847                   sStructGridNo = FindNearestOpenableNonDoor( pSoldier->sGridNo );
04848             }
04849 
04850             if ( sStructGridNo == NOWHERE )
04851             {
04852                   return( FALSE );
04853             }
04854       
04855             pStructure = FindStructure( sStructGridNo, STRUCTURE_OPENABLE );  
04856       }
04857 
04858       if ( pStructure == NULL )
04859       {
04860             return( FALSE );
04861       }
04862 
04863       if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN )
04864       {
04865             // it's already open!
04866             TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( pSoldier->ubProfile, APPROACH_DONE_OPEN_STRUCTURE, FALSE );
04867             return( FALSE );
04868       }
04869 
04870       // anything that an NPC opens this way should become unlocked!
04871 
04872       pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( sStructGridNo );
04873       if ( pDoor ) 
04874       {
04875             pDoor->fLocked = FALSE;
04876       }
04877 
04878       sActionGridNo =  FindAdjacentGridEx( pSoldier, sStructGridNo, &ubDirection, NULL, FALSE, TRUE );
04879       if ( sActionGridNo == -1 )
04880       {
04881             return( FALSE );
04882       }
04883 
04884       // Set dest gridno
04885       sGridNo = sActionGridNo;
04886 
04887       StartInteractiveObject( sStructGridNo, pStructure->usStructureID, pSoldier, ubDirection );
04888 
04889       // check if we are at this location
04890       if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo )
04891       {
04892              InteractWithInteractiveObject( pSoldier, pStructure, ubDirection );
04893       }
04894       else
04895       {
04896              SendGetNewSoldierPathEvent( pSoldier, sGridNo, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04897       }
04898 
04899       pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_PENDING_ACTION;
04900 
04901       return( TRUE );
04902 
04903 }
04904 
04905 void TextRegionClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
04906 {
04907       static BOOLEAN fLButtonDown = FALSE;
04908 
04909       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
04910       {
04911             fLButtonDown = TRUE;
04912       }
04913 
04914       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP && fLButtonDown )
04915       {
04916             InternalShutupaYoFace( gTalkPanel.iFaceIndex, FALSE );
04917       }
04918       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
04919       {
04920             fLButtonDown = FALSE;
04921       }
04922 }

04925 void CarmenLeavesSectorCallback( void )
04926 {
04927       if (gWorldSectorX == 13 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_C && gbWorldSectorZ == 0)
04928       {
04929             TriggerNPCRecord( 78, 34 );
04930       }
04931       else if (gWorldSectorX == 9 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_G && gbWorldSectorZ == 0)
04932       {
04933             TriggerNPCRecord( 78, 35 );
04934       }
04935       else if (gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_C && gbWorldSectorZ == 0)
04936       {
04937             TriggerNPCRecord( 78, 36 );
04938       }
04939 
04940 }
